name: Mccain Lightly Spiced Wedges 750G
description: Lightly coated potato wedges seasoned with herbs and spices.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>4 This pack contains 4 ovened servings</Number_Of_Uses><Cooking_Guidelines>Cooking Instructions (General): The following cooking instructions are for 500g of McCain Lightly Spiced Wedges. For smaller quantities reduce the cooking time accordingly. For best results cook from frozen. Do not overcook!Oven cook (From Frozen): Preheat the oven to 220째C / 430째F / Gas Mark 7.For fan assisted ovens that's 210째C / 425째F.Spread your McCain Lightly Spiced Wedges evenly in a single layer onto a baking tray and pop it into the top of the oven. Bake for 18 minutes, turning them every now and again, until they're lovely, crisp and light golden.Grill (From Frozen): Remove the rack from the grill pan. Preheat the grill for five minutes at a low heat. Spread your McCain Lightly Spiced Wedges evenly in a single layer onto the grill pan. Grill for 12 - 14 minutes, turning them every now and again, until they're lovely, crisp and light golden.</Cooking_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Batter (Wheat Flour (with Calcium, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Wheat Starch, Salt, Garlic Powder, Spices, Onion Powder, Tomato Powder, Oregano, Flavouring, Natural Colour (Paprika Extract))
